name: Portfolio Web
description: A modern portfolio showcasing web and digital projects with detailed insights into creative solutions and skills. A reflection of dedication to digital excellence.

name: Alkas Telecom
description: A landing page for Alkas Telecom, a fictitious telecom company offering cutting-edge mobile plans and devices. Designed with a focus on user experience, the site invites visitors to explore services through an intuitive and visually appealing interface.
